results.title: Retail stock management
results.creator_credit: James Allen, Peter Bradford and World Wide Pictures
results.brief_description: A film designed for retailers showing quite simply how stock control helps a shopkeeper to increase his stock turnover and therefore profits.

results.title: Resurrection
results.brief_description: Based on Leo Tolstoy’s novel this is a story of seduction and abandonment, guilt and redemption. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, Marion Leonard, Owen Moore, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
results.description: Based on Leo Tolstoy’s novel this is a story of seduction and abandonment, guilt and redemption. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, Marion Leonard, Owen Moore, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.

results.title: Restoration [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Cordelia Beresford, Kate Riedl and AFTRS
results.brief_description: An old battered photograph captures the image of a young domestic servant living and working on a NSW property in 1912. Using fragments of memory and ritual, the film gradually reveals the events behind the photo. It becomes clear that willing submission can disguise a fierce determination to change.
results.description: An old battered photograph captures the image of a young domestic servant living and working on a NSW property in 1912. results.title: Respiratory tract infection in children's wards
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Prevention of Cross Infection”.
Illustrates how cross infection by contact, droplet and dust borne methods may be prevented by isolation, barrier nursing and other methods. Written and directed by Margaret Thomson.

group_siblings.creator_credit: Margaret Thomson and Crown Film Unit

results.title: Respiratory and cardiac arrest
results.brief_description: Deals in detail with methods of resuscitation after heart failure during anaesthesia. It is treated in three parts: apparatus, respiratory obstruction, and cardiac arrest.

results.title: Respecting differences (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: New South Wales Government and Panorama Productions
results.brief_description: Shows the difficulties that migrant children have in adjusting to Australian schools and culture, especially non-English speaking children. Recently the New South Wales Government has given funds to support the teaching of ethnic languages in many state schools which helps facilitate adjustment to Australian life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: New South Wales Government and Panorama Productions

results.title: Research in the atmosphere (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Film Graphics and National Aeronautics and Space Administration
results.brief_description: Traces the methods of exploring the upper atmosphere and near-earth environment from ancient times until the present, with emphasis on research with balloons and sounding rockets.

results.title: Research and modern housing
results.creator_credit: Richard F. Tambling, Julian Wintle and Verity Films
results.brief_description: Describes the work and experiments carried out at the Building Research Station of the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research, England. Shows new ideas for better, cheaper and quicker building techniques and the way this is helping to solve postwar housing problems in Britain.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Richard F. Tambling, Julian Wintle and Verity Films
